content.html: Tweeps are just hanging out in Slack saying nice things to each other until their access is cut off. I’ve never seen anything like it. Some really incredible people leaving Twitter tonight. We are all worse off without them there
content.value:
Tweeps are just hanging out in Slack saying nice things to each other until their access is cut off. I’ve never seen anything like it. 

Some really incredible people leaving Twitter tonight. We are all worse off without them there
